parameters: "About time. I'm not getting any younger after all."
"Do you wanna know what's in this pod?"
"It's a bit of a shroedinger's cat, really."
"I'm sure you know how the experiment goes."
"Say, have you ever given up on something out of fear
"Whether this experiment is a success or
not, this is the end for me."
"When my creators decided to hand in the towel, I
resented them. I couldn't understand their motive..."
"I destroyed them to keep this experiment going.
I did terrible things to their son, and even
"And all of it might have been completely pointless."
"Have you ever asked yourself how Sofia died?"
"She was murdered by her own iteration."
"Until the moment of her death she had no idea what was
"Even though her iterations were able to communicate
with each other beyond their deaths, she stayed
completely unaware to any of it."
"The point of iterating was to preserve someone's
life... So she met quite an ironic end, wouldn't you
"Lately I've come to romanticize this irony."
"Do you want to know why I took on her name?"
"Because I reject the name my creators gave to me."
"They called me Icarus. I don't mind the name itself,
it is only the meaning I resent."
"'The one who flew too close to the sun...'
It's almost like they set me up for failure."
"I guess in the end that's all I ever was.
"But you are different. You are special."
"You may just have what it takes to become a god."
"...Perhaps you resent me. I can't fault you,
"I promise you'll get to put the final bullet through
my head once the time comes, but until then..."
"I want to pass on my work towards you."
"I will give you all my knowledge. You alone can give
"You know just as well as me, that this is the only
future you have. 'Crow's life isn't yours to live after
"Unless you choose to give this life back.
I cannot make that decision for you."
"If you're willing to cooperate with me, has the cat
In this world what kind of future will you create?
When I wake up, my surroundings are cold and I'm
enveloped in darkness. There is a horrible stench
As I try to move, I realize that my hands have
been bound. There also seems to be some kind of fabric
"?! Who's there? Are you the bastard who
I'm in the same situation, dipshit."
"How are you so calm? We need to get
A few hours pass as we sit next to each other in
complete silence. I try to get some more information
out of the person next to me, but to no avail.
At last the silence is interrupted.
For a moment the room falls silent again.
All I hear is the sound of my own breath hitting
against the fabric around my face, accompied by the
horrible stench of blood around me.
Then suddenly somebody yanks the fabric off of my head
As I look upon the last face I would ever see.

I didn't really get any of it, but I understood
